title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.13.0.18 发布
author: AzureZeng
txt_content:
本帖最后由 AZWorld 于 2019-10-3 13:47 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。Minecraft 基岩版 1.13 仍未发布，1.13.0.18 为其第 10 个测试版。转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
Fixes:
修复: 
Crashes/Performance
崩溃修复/性能
Fixed a crash that occurred when accepting the storage permission on Android
修复了 Android 系统中获取存储权限时发生的崩溃Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay
修复了一些游戏期间发生的崩溃Fixed a crash that could occur when scrolling through languages in the Settings (MCPE-52009)
修复了在设置中的语言选项中滑动项目而导致的崩溃Fixed a crash that could occur when using the Character Creator on Android (MCPE-52474)
修复了 Android 系统中使用 角色创建器 时发生的崩溃

General
常规
The 'Beam Me Up' achievement can once again be unlocked
"把我传走"成就又可以解锁了

Gameplay
游戏体验
Fixed players falling from the sky after riding an entity in Creative mode (MCPE-52957)
修复了在创造模式下，玩家骑行之后从空中摔下来的漏洞Fixed players spawning in unexpected locations after roaming a world save to a different Xbox One
修复了在不同的 Xbox One 中漫游世界时玩家生成在错误的位置的问题

Mobs
生物
Zombies once again spawn in caves (MCPE-52743)
僵尸又会生成于洞穴中了

Items
物品
Carpets once again appear on the Llama's inventory screen
地毯又会出现在羊驼的物品栏界面了Crossbows no longer fire immediately after loading (MCPE-52179)
弩不会在弹药装载完毕后立刻发射了Fixed the ability to discard damaged tools from the Creative inventory (MCPE-52465)
修复了在创造模式物品栏中放弃受损物品的问题Compasses and clocks once again animate on the hotbar (MCPE-52901)
在热键栏中的指南针和时钟的动画再次能显示正确Armor can once again be equipped directly from the Creative inventory on touch screens (MCPE-52413)
在创造模式下，现在可以直接触摸屏幕来直接装备盔甲Frost Walker boots once again freeze water
附魔有冰霜行者的靴子再次能使水结冰

Graphical
图形
The breaking animation once again appears on chests
箱子的被破坏动画再次能正确显示Fixed the player's head looking wrongly when sneaking (MCPE-51181)
修复了当玩家潜行时其头颅显示错误的问题Fixed the player's arms not animating when swimming (MCPE-49749)
修复了玩家游泳时手臂动画不正常的问题Mob heads once again fit properly on players
生物头颅(穿戴时)再次能合适玩家的大小Fixed the Crafting Table icon not showing its grid on top in certain GUI scales
修复了工作台图标在特定的 GUI 标度修正下不显示其顶部网格的问题Fixed several missing and broken textures in the inventory (MCPE-52442)
修复了物品栏中的一些丢失和损坏的材质Fixed some skins appearing with a white cape (MCPE-52005)
修复了一些皮肤显示时带有一个白色披风的问题Fixed armor not respecting extra layers on skins
修复了盔甲无法兼容皮肤的额外一层的问题Fixed destroyed blocks leaving shadows
修复了被破坏方块留下阴影的问题

User Interface
用户界面
Various fixes and loading time improvements to the Character Creator interface
角色创造器的一些修复和加载时间优化External servers once again appear on the Servers screen
外部服务器再次会显示在服务器界面Fixed the inventory screens of some blocks not appearing on the first attempt after the block's state has changed, like Hoppers and Dispensers
修复了诸如漏斗和发射器的方块的状态改变后，第一次尝试打开其物品栏界面失败的问题The Profile screen can now be accessed when playing split-screen
档案界面在分屏游戏时能打开了The "Read More" button once again appears next to packs on the Global Resource menu
在全局资源菜单中，"阅读更多"按钮再次会显示在资源包旁边

Commands
指令
The '/summon 'command once again properly names entities, if defined
/summon 指令再次能正确的命名实体了(如果定义了名字)

Add-Ons and Script Engine
Add-ons 和脚本引擎
Fixed spawn eggs not appearing in the Creative inventory for custom mobs
修复了自定义生物的刷怪蛋在创造模式下不出现的问题Item held by scaled mobs are once again sized appropriately
由被缩放的生物所拿着的物品再次会渲染出(与生物)同样的大小Using 'format_version' 1.2.0 no longer breaks the 'on_damage' component
使用"format_version" 1.2.0 设置不再会破坏"on_damage"组件了Triggering custom animations for entities is once again functional
对实体触发自定义动画再次有用Using the 'transformation' component on 'xp_orb' once again removes the source entity
在"xp_orb"(经验球)上使用"transformation"再次会移除源实体了The 'spawn_entity' component is now executed when an entity is being ridden
现在当实体被骑时，"spawn_entity"组件会执行了Fixed the Ender Dragon not appearing correctly in some Add-On packs
修复了末影龙在一些 Add-on 资源包中不正确生成的问题Errors are once again listed on the pack manifest validation screen
(资源包中存在的)错误再次会在资源包清单验证界面中显示了
